title: Abila Continues Strong MIP Fund Accounting Growth With 68 New Customers; Cloud-based Advance Seeing Significant Traction
text:
Abila
Nonprofit and governmental organizations continue to choose true fund accounting™ gold standard solution to manage financial complexity
AUSTIN, Texas , Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- In today's financially complex world, organizations continue to choose the true fund accounting™ solution that provides the greatest peace of mind, MIP Fund Accounting ™. Abila continues strong growth, adding more than 68 new MIP Fund Accounting customers, ranging from large governmental organizations to mid-size nonprofits across a variety of vertical sectors, including healthcare, cause & cure, and education.
In particular, MIP Advance™ , the cloud-based version of MIP Fund Accounting, is gaining significant traction as organizations see the value in secure anytime, anywhere access coupled with decades of industry-leading expertise in fund accounting.
"MIP Fund Accounting and cloud-based MIP Advance continue to drive tremendous interest with clients and prospects we speak to on a regular basis," said Mustafa Kamal from REDW, LLC, an Abila Business Partner. "MIP's strong foundation and capabilities provide a solid, purpose-built solution to help organizations quickly and easily manage the complex nonprofit accounting landscape."
Organizations continue to have a choice when it comes to MIP Fund Accounting, from cloud-based to on-premises, as well as full integration with many leading donor management systems. Abila provides organizations the broadest range of options to suit every customer's needs.
New MIP Fund Accounting customers include:
Alabama State Bar ARC of Cape May County Center for Youth Wellness Eastside Preparatory School Pulmonary Fibrosis Foundation South Dakota Advocacy Services "True fund accounting is essential for nonprofit and governmental organizations to perform optimally when it comes to managing and tracking funds from multiple sources," said Krista Endsley from Abila. "We're proud to help our customers continue solving real problems with the gold standard in true fund accounting."
True fund accounting™ is represented by a multi-dimensional and flexible chart of accounts that provide organizations with the detailed coding and tracking of all financial activities with unlimited segments or dimensions. Abila is the only company that offers nonprofits a true fund accounting solution built with and for nonprofit financial professionals to serve their unique needs.
About Abila
Abila is the leading provider of software and services to nonprofits, associations, and governmental entities that help them improve decision making, execute with greater precision, increase engagement, and generate more revenue. With Abila solutions, association and nonprofit professionals can use data and personal insight to make better financial and strategic decisions, enhance member and donor engagement and value, operate more efficiently and effectively, and increase revenue to better activate their mission. Abila combines decades of industry insight with technology know-how to serve more than 8,000 customers across North America . For more information, please visit www.abila.com .
